title: WTT T213-1 Myers for a T213-1 So Lgr
author: White Borders

posts.post_title: WTT T213-1 Myers for a T213-1 So Lgr
posts.post_content:
I picked up this T213-1 Chief Myers in the B&L Auction in hopes that I could trade it for another T213-1 of similar value and grade.  I would really like to get one of the following So Lgrs out of the deal:

Bay, Bernhard, Breitenstein, Carey, Ellam, Fritz, Greminger, B. Hart, J. Hart, Hickman, Lentz, Molesworth, Perdue, Persons, Sid Smith, Thornton.

Anyone Interested? Please PM me or contact me by email:  [url]craig_w67217@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks and Best Regards,
Craig
